thread.title: Future & Kodak Black Have Been "Going Ham" In The Studio
thread.title_full: Future & Kodak Black Have Been "Going Ham" In The Studio

author: Danny Schwartz
title: Future & Kodak Black Have Been "Going Ham" In The Studio
text:
Home > Music > Future & Kodak Black Have Been "Going Ham" In The Studio Future & Kodak Black Have Been "Going Ham" In The Studio 0 0 2 Posted by Danny Schwartz , Feb 22, 2017 at 03:34pm By the sounds of it, Future and Kodak Black have been cooking up some major heat. 
It appears that Future and Kodak Black have been in the studio cooking up some major heat. 
Freebandz affiliate Zoey Dollaz casually mentioned that the two had been working together in the studio, and that fans should expect a collaboration to be released at some point. “Kodak & Future got some shit coming,” Zoey tweeted. “them boys in the stu goin ham , thank me later .. lol.” 
Tuesday night, Kodak posted an Instagram video in which he bumps "Mask Off" and flaunts a fan of bills for the camera in a Range Rover that his friend had just purchased from Future. “My Nigga Just Bought Da Range From Future," Kodak wrote. "He Handed Me Da Keys And Said Tear It Up I Ain’t Even Ask Em To." Kodak & Future got some shit coming ... them boys in the stu goin ham , thank me later .. lol
